Terms of Service

By using threepeakviews.com, you agree to the terms below. Please review them carefully.

Orders and Payments

  • All prices are shown in USD and are subject to change.
  • Orders are confirmed once payment is successfully processed.
  • We may cancel orders for suspected fraud or inventory issues.

Shipping and Returns

  • Shipping timelines are estimates and may vary by region.
  • Returns must be requested within 30 days of delivery.

Account Responsibilities

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
